Name: Viral
About the game: A straightforward and exhilarating first-person-shooter game that runs on all platforms (including mobile phones)! Update on Dec 30th 2017: The game now supports Bots! Press pause(escape) during a game to add bots into the game. Careful! Theyâ€™re quite strong, believe me. Pick a side, join the army of Viruses or White-Blood-Cells, and invade/protect the human body as you defeat your enemies. Simple rules: shoot to kill. No need to spend time figuring out controls and settings, just start the game and enjoy a thrilling good old-fashioned shoot-out. Play with friends! Gather some friends and their PC/Mac/Smartphone, connect to the same Wi-Fi, and the game is on!
